channel.title: gitlab on SoBo's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in gitlab on SoBo's Dev Log

item.title: GitLab CI/CD for Flatpak
item.description: Thanks to this document, and a quick look at nautilus’s git repo I was able to automatically generate fresh flatpaks directly from GitLab by using the integrated CI/CD system. My current setup isn’t perfect but it manages to automate flatpak builds.
